item.title: Job no 8004958, 22nd September
item.description:

item.title: Overgrown overhanging branches, 22nd September
item.description:
This is now the 6th time of report this The tress are overgrown and over hanging the road lorries hit causing leaves all over the road Tress so big blocking the street lights from working adding to the fly tipping and litter all along the verge U keep closing the report with out doing anything
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lodge Hill, East Wickham, London

item.title: Damaged Water Meter Cover, 22nd September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royston Road, Crayford, London

item.title: Whole street masses of litter and rubbish., 22nd September
item.description:
Overflowing black bins. Entire length of Crewdson Road is litter and debris. Rubbish everywhere. Occurs in the days prior to every fortnightly black bin collection. This occurrence present for 3-4 days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Crewdson Road, Oval, London
